name: Dynamic UE Admission Control  Dynamic GBR Admission Control  Load-Based CA SCell Handling  Enhanced PTT Admission Control
value_package: High Load Handling  VoLTE Performance  Mission Critical High Load Handling  Mission-Critical Services
summary: The Load-Based CA SCell Handling feature allows prioritization of cell resources for RRC

parameters.name: EUtranCellFDD.loadBasedCaMsrThr
parameters.description: See MOM description.  The attribute references struct LoadBasedCaMsrThr.                                 The struct has the following members:  dlPrbUtilThreshHigh     dlPrbUtilThreshLow     ulPrbUtilThreshHigh     ulPrbUtilThreshLow     dlSeUtilThreshHigh     dlSeUtilThreshLow     ulSeUtilThreshHigh     ulSeUtilThreshLow     cceUtilThreshHigh     cceUtilThreshLow

events.name: LOCAL_EVENT_CELL_CA_LOCKED_HL_TIME
events.type: Local event reported per minute while cell is in high load state,                                     containing CA lock time in seconds. This event is reported on                                     capacity cells enabled.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012296 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012296 MO instance.
